Tweet: Dear #Iran:  Today is a day of celebration.   #Argentina just won the #WorldCup against #France in #Qatar2022. The latter has displayed sportsmanship in its defeat.  Please join the celebration and STOP the execution of #AmirNasrAzadani. Don’t commit this crime.  Best,  A fan  https://t.co/5Y1iVv8siC

“There has been so many great World Cup moments in #Qatar2022 . Saudi Arabia beating Argentina, Asano’s goal vs. Germany & Iran’s injury-time goals vs. Wales.” - Peter Drury  Iran’s dramatic win is remembered as one of the moments of the tournament by the legendary commentator.  https://t.co/seuIfFWlxy
